lead_paragraph: Normally, it takes wins in five full matches to reach a Grand Slam semifinal. Novak Djokovic has made it that far at the U.S. Open by playing only two, because three opponents pulled out of the tournament with injuries.

headline.print_headline: Another Free Pass for Djokovic at US Open When Tsonga Stops
headline.main: Another Free Pass for Djokovic at US Open When Tsonga Stops
